verses.verse: Alleluia! not as orphans Are we left in sorrow now; Alleluia! He is near us, Faith believes, nor questions how: Though the cloud from sight received Him, When the forty days were o'er, Shall our hearts forget His promise, "I am with you evermore"?

Alleluia! Bread of heaven, Thou on earth our food, our stay! Alleluia! here the sinful Flee to Thee from day to day: Intercessor, Friend of sinners, Earth's Redeemer plead for me, Where the songs of all the sinless Sweep across the crystal sea.
